Augmented Reality in a Contact Lens

Posted to Mottr.am by Jack on 02 September 2009. Tagged augmentation and future.

Fascinating work, but I’d actually prefer AR tech in a pair of specs (which should be possible right now, or very soon, shouldn’t it? Translucent OLED films on the lenses, or something like that). Via Guardian Technology.
